Name: AUTOCROSS MADNESS
About the game: Time to tour the world! Drive trough beautiful landscapes and go mad into curves or just be a Sunday driver. Challenge yourself in driving like a mad man as you try to get to the finish line as fast as possible. ■ 3D arcade racing with car physics ■ Challenging ■ Unlimited NITRO ■ 12 maps all over the world Have fun! DCGsoft TEAM
